Title: Hotel Management System
ImgAlt: A image of the hotel management application
About: The Hotel Booking System is a minimal web-based application that allows users to search and book. It provides an Razor Pages web interface for customers to book available rooms and an desktop application for hotel staff to perform booking validation and check-in.
Challenges: The main challenges included designing an efficient booking workflow, synchronizing data between the web and desktop apps, and handling booking conflicts. Optimizing database queries with Dapper.

Title: Chess Game
ImgAlt: A image of the chess Board
About: A WPF desktop chess application that allows two players to play on the same computer. The project focuses on implementing core chess rules and move validation using coordinate-based logic. The chessboard and pieces are rendered dynamically using WPF Grid and C#, with real-time updates as moves are made. Additional features include highlighting valid moves.git
Challenges: Implementing the entire game logic based on coordinate calculations and rendering a dynamic chessboard UI in WPF, while ensuring interactive features like possible moves highlighting worked correctly.
